create_event_start: Create your first event to get started!
search_placeholder: Search by event, city, location, or community...
hero_headline: AI-powered photo discovery meets viral engagement.
hero_subheadline: Help your attendees find themselves instantly, and build vibrant communities around every event.
social_proof: Trusted by photographers • Loved by attendees • Powered by AI
why_dope_sub: Transform event photography into interactive experiences
feature_discovery_desc: Upload your selfie and let AI find all your photos instantly. No more endless scrolling.
feature_viral_desc: React and star favorites. Turn every photo into shareable content.
feature_community_desc: Build engaged communities around each event. Leaderboards, badges keep the conversation going.
for_photographers_desc: Create your branded event galleries, engage your audience, and grow your business.
